FuncDef:
The clock alarm-threshold frequency-offset command configures an alarm threshold for frequency offset at the physical layer.
The undo clock alarm-threshold frequency-offset command restores the default configuration.
By default, the alarm threshold for frequency offset at the physical layer is 9200 ppb.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an alarm threshold for frequency offset at the physical layer.
The value is an integer ranging from 10 to 92, in 100 ppb.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure an alarm threshold for frequency offset at the physical layer, run the clock alarm-threshold frequency-offset command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
